text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Hey there, Tap! The boss at my part-time gig insisted 
I bring this along. It's paint for them fancy props!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Tap, I've got what you asked for, and I've even roped in 
a buddy from the theater world for some extra help!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Hoh, good job! Mighty fine work, y'all! I'm bettin' our captain's gonna be happier than a cat in a yarn shop, ain't that right?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hold on a moment, Tap! Would you be so kind as to introduce 
these fine individuals to me first? They're all fresh faces, some 
of which I believe I haven't come across on campus before…

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
These here are my buddies! They're the folks who 
looked out for me before we set foot on this campus. 
Mighty dependable, I tell ya!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
My folks are your folks! Together with our crew, 
we're a growin' force to be reckoned with ——

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend C
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaaaaaaaaa!? Who in tarnation did this! 
Somebody done splattered paint all over me!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend D
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! It's a mighty fine color for yer tail! 
You bein' focused on paintin' made it eas― 
H-Hey! Ain't no need for violence!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
—— Hahaha! Make some noise, y'all! …It's heaps more fun 
when we all chip in together, don't ya reckon?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
… Yes, you are right. This approach does indeed appear 
more grand. Thank you, Tap… alrighty then!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ladies and gentlemen, I thank you all for your cooperation! 
Let us endeavor to make this play a true showstopper!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
—— That idea for the set is as delightful as a summer sunset! 
It suits Gimlet's image perfectly.

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Right? The minute I heard the tale, I figured that 
old-school charm would suit it to a tee. I used to 
tread the boards a mite back in the day, see.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Wow～! So that's how you knew some theatre folks, eh? 
Having someone with experience is quite comforting!

text_block_list.name: Tap's Friend C
text_block_list.text:
Hey, directooor! You remember which classroom 
houses that sewin' machine?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I'll be there in a jiffy!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
—— Interesting…… 
So that's how her highness manages her flock.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
They're F-R-I-E-N-D-S! ……I'm reckonin' this here 
will be a memorable adventure for Fine too.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Sharin' the load's all part of the journey. 
We should pour our hearts into actin' for her sake as well!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …… Hmph. There's something else we should be worried about……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
(… Everyone is serious about creating a good play. 
Mission — As the lead, I must perform exceptionally.)

text_block_list.name: Drama Coach
text_block_list.text:
—— Alright then, shall we try some emotional expressions? 
Ms. Tap and Ms. Shakur! Step on up!

text_block_list.name: Tap & Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Funny! (*ˊᗜˋ*) Happy! (˶˃ ᵕ ˂˶) Sad…… (˙◠˙) Angry! ( •̀ ᴖ •́) 
Surprised. (°ロ°) Scared…… ₍˶Ó﹏Ò )

text_block_list.name: Drama Coach
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Shakur, let's see more of that enthusiasm, please! 
Now… moving on to Ms. Kris S.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Happy. Sad. Angry. Surprised. Scared. [•_•]

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
…… I'm sorry. Expressing emotions… 
is something I'm not good at.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
No problem! Your role's that of a mechanical doll, ain't it? 
Not havin' them emotions might just be the ticket.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I suppose. 
But… Gimlet…

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
My heart is resolute — Kris S, I entrust this destiny to you. 
Like bidding farewell to King Lear, lost in the wilderness, 
we shall enact this sorrowful parting.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my best. 
―― I want to express… "sadness".

text_block_list.name: Drama Coach
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… maybe it'd be a good idea to explore your character 
a little deeper. Why don't you try sorting out the emotions of 
the mechanical doll in your own way, Ms. Kris S?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
(The mechanical doll sets out on its final journey. Leaving the 
land that had bound it, heading towards an eternal, solitary 
voyage… That sadness, the sorrow of saying goodbye…)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
…… Goodbye. Goodbye… 
Goodbye…… ―― Shoot.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Tap! Is Kris… still having trouble?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
As you can see. She's been like that all along. 
But I reckon it fits that mechanical doll just right.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… I wonder if it might be better if she could truly 
immerse herself in the role she's been assigned? 
In that case, just a moment ago……

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Wow～! You two ladies are looking quite splendid!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… I am… a mechanical doll.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Yes! At present, you're the spitting image of a flawless 
mechanical doll. How about trying out those lines with 
your newfound inspiration?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ―― It's time for me to depart. With the dawn… I bid farewell to you, venturing out on my eternal journey.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
(……I am a mechanical doll. Now…… I shall bid 
a sorrowful "farewell". For the journey ahead……)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: O, devil, from me there is but one word — farewell. To time, to humanity, to the heart…… adieu ――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
……… I apologize. 
It sounds… not right.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Kris, there is no need to apologize. 
You haven't done a thing wrong.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
But… I was not able to fulfill my task. 
…… It's so frustrating.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Kris……

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
… Perhaps, Shakur, you might be easier for Kris 
to collaborate with. Say something like, "Shall I 
banish you to the depths of hell?"

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
That's not even in the script. …Can we just forget 
about the script? It's still just a draft. Don't know 
what that fool is up to ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: —— Pitiful!!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
I dared to take on the mantle of a god and sought to 
shape the world… Is this my retribution?!
